website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few quirks, this bowl is the one to get for cooks who like to mix ingredients in clear batter bowls. It has all the features that make meal prep a bit easier.

cons: Glass defects that caused sharp edges reported
Some bowls were damaged upon arrival
Lid is handy, but a bit difficult to put on and take off
